StSShapeShifter:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

StSShapeShifter:SapBurstPower.NAME: Sap Burst
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, reduce a random enemy's strength by #b

StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpiritPower.NAME: Diverse Spirit
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a unique form this combat, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card

StSShapeShifter:DeerFormPower.NAME: Deer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a random skill to your hand

StSShapeShifter:Lynx.NAME: Lynx Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Lynx Form, gain 1(2) strength

StSShapeShifter:BearFormPower.NAME: Bear Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Bear Form, gain 2(3) Dexterity

StSShapeShifter:TortoiseFormPower.NAME: Tortoise Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Tortoise Form, gain 1(2) Dexterity
